data.title: Conversations; 113; Pat Fordice with Larry Miller
data.meta_description:
Series: Conversations Time 27:45 No. 113 Title: Pat Fordice with Larry
Miller Patricia Owens "Pat" Fordice ( 1935 _) was the First Lady of
Mississippi from 1992 until 1999 as the wife of Governor Kirk Fordice.
Conversations is a talk show featuring discussions with public figures in
Mississippi.
data.text: Welcome to the American Archive of Public Broadcasting Online Reading Room (ORR). To access media in the ORR, please review and agree to the ORR Rules of Use.
